segment.source: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) deployment.
segment.target: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) deployment.

segment.source: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for an Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring deployment.
segment.target: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for an Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring deployment.

segment.source: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.
segment.target: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.

segment.source: Review the getting started information about MBAM to gain a basic understanding of the product before beginning deployment planning.
segment.target: Review the getting started information about MBAM to gain a basic understanding of the product before beginning deployment planning.

segment.source: Plan for MBAM 2.0 Deployment Prerequisites and prepare your computing environment.
segment.target: Plan for MBAM 2.0 Deployment Prerequisites and prepare your computing environment.

segment.source: Plan for and configure MBAM Group Policy requirements.
segment.target: Plan for and configure MBAM Group Policy requirements.

segment.source: Planning for MBAM 2.0 Group Policy Requirements
segment.target: Planning for MBAM 2.0 Group Policy Requirements

segment.source: Plan for and create necessary Active Directory Domain Services security groups and plan for MBAM local security group membership requirements.
segment.target: Plan for and create necessary Active Directory Domain Services security groups and plan for MBAM local security group membership requirements.

segment.source: Review the MBAM 2.0 Supported Configurations documentation to ensure that hardware that meets MBAM installation system requirements is available.
segment.target: Review the MBAM 2.0 Supported Configurations documentation to ensure that hardware that meets MBAM installation system requirements is available.

segment.source: Plan for deploying MBAM Server feature deployment.
segment.target: Plan for deploying MBAM Server feature deployment.

segment.source: Plan for deploying MBAM Client deployment.
segment.target: Plan for deploying MBAM Client deployment.

segment.source: Validate your deployment plan in a test environment.
segment.target: Validate your deployment plan in a test environment.
